emp_rate.long_description: Population, self-reported as employed, as a percentage of the total civilian workforce population. Geographies: Census Tract (11), County (5)
emp_rate.short_description: Population, self-reported as employed, as a percentage of the total civilian workforce population. Geographies: Census Tract (11), County (5)

sources.name: American Community Survey
sources.location: 5-Year estimates, table B23025, via the API

emp_rate.statement: {value} of the population in {region_name} is employed.

labor_participate_rate_geo20.long_description: The percentage of individuals, ages 16-64, in the active labor force. The job participation rate is often used by economists as an indicator of economic development and growth. Geographies: Census Tract (11), County (5)
labor_participate_rate_geo20.short_description: The percentage of individuals, ages 16-64, in the active labor force. The job participation rate is often used by economists as an indicator of economic development and growth. Geographies: Census Tract (11), County (5)

sources.name: American Community Survey
sources.location: 5-Year estimates, table S2301_C02_001, via the API

labor_participate_rate_geo20.statement: {value} of the population in {region_name} is participating in the civilian job force.
